### Split data into columns

```{r, eval=F}
tmp <- data.frame(cat = c('ABC', 'BCA', 'CAB', '', 'AXC', '12345', NA, '1'))

split_column(tmp$cat, split = 'A')
split_column(tmp$cat, split = '')
```
